description:
8月12日周五晚《中国新歌声》的舞台上。最后一轮盲选中，浙江金华项亚蕻一曲摇滚震撼了汪峰老师。

“Talk to me softly. There's something in your eyes……”上世纪90年代，美国硬摇滚——枪花乐队的名曲《Don’t Cry》唱哭了无数人。这回，项亚蕻将它带到《中国新歌声》现场。

汪峰直接以头触碰按灯爆灯。“他里面的内容都是很伤感的，但是反而给人以极大的力量，这绝对是个宝啊!”“这绝对是，太是宝了!因为他自己写的歌也很厉害，欢迎你来到我的战队。”

【歌曲原版】看这里

【关于Guns N' Roses】

Guns N' Roses is an American hard rock band from Los Angeles formed in 1985. The classic lineup, as signed to Geffen Records in 1986, consisted of vocalistAxl Rose, lead guitarist Slash, rhythm guitarist Lzzy Stradlin, bassist Duff McKagan, and drummer Steven Adler. The current lineup consists of Rose, Slash, McKagan, keyboardists Dizzy Reed and Melissa Reese, guitarist Richard Fortus and drummer Frank Ferrer. The band has released six studio albums, accumulatingsales of more than 100 million records worldwide, including shipments of 45 million in the United States, making Guns N' Roses one of the world's best-selling bands of all time.枪炮与玫瑰乐队（常缩写为枪花、G N' R或GnR）是一支成立于1985年的洛杉矶的美国硬摇滚乐队。初始的阵容是被格芬唱片公司签约的，包括歌手Axl Rose，主吉他手Slash，节奏吉他手Lzzy Stradlin，贝斯手Duff McKagan和鼓手Steven Adler。现在的成员除了Rose，Slash，McKagan，还有新成员键盘手Dizzy Reed和Melissa Reese，吉他手Richard Fortus，和鼓手Frank Ferrer。这支乐队有六张录音室专辑，全球范围内的销量超过1亿张唱片，在美国的销量是4500万张，因此枪花乐队是世界上最畅销的乐队之一。

【关于歌曲】

"Don't Cry" is a power ballad by the hard rock band Guns N' Roses, two versions of which were released simultaneously on different albums. The song reached the top 10 in many countries, including number 8 in the UK Singles Chart and number 10 in the U.S. on the Billboard Hot 100.《Don't Cry》是硬摇滚乐队——枪花乐队的一首摇滚抒情曲，这首歌有两个版本分别收录在不同的专辑中。这首歌在很多国家都拿到过前十名的销量，比如在英国单曲榜获得第八名，在美国的公告牌Hot 100获得第十名。
